/* HydtMetrMap.SelectHydtMetrList 급수전계량기 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.HOM_NUM LIKE '%' ||#HOM_NUM#|| '%'
A.HOM_NAM LIKE '%' || #HOM_NAM# || '%'
A.HOM_CDE = #HOM_CDE#
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , decode(length(A.IST_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.IST_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.HOM_NAM , A.HOM_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HOM_CDE) AS HOM_CDE_NAM , A.HOM_ADR , A.HOM_CNT , A.SBI_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250020' AND DTL_CD = A.SBI_CDE ) AS SBI_NAM , A.MET_DIP , A.MOF_CDE , A.PRD_NUM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.MET_NUM , A.MET_MOF , A.HOM_HJD , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.HOM_NUM LIKE '%' ||#HOM_NUM#|| '%'
A.HOM_NAM LIKE '%' || #HOM_NAM# || '%'
A.HOM_CDE = #HOM_CDE#
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* HydtMetrMap.SelectHydtMetrDtl 급수전계량기 상세정보*/
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, M.* FROM ( SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , a.IST_YMD , A.HOM_NUM , A.HOM_NAM , A.HOM_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HOM_CDE) AS HOM_CDE_NAM , A.HOM_ADR , A.HOM_CNT , A.SBI_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250020' AND DTL_CD = A.SBI_CDE ) AS SBI_NAM , A.MET_DIP , A.MOF_CDE , A.PRD_NUM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.MET_NUM , A.MET_MOF , A.HOM_HJD , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN# ) M
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , IST_YMD , HOM_NUM , HOM_NAM , HOM_CDE , HOM_ADR , HOM_CNT , SBI_CDE , MET_DIP , MOF_CDE , PRD_NUM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , MET_NUM , MET_MOF , HOM_HJD ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #IST_YMD# , #HOM_NUM# , #HOM_NAM# , #HOM_CDE# , #HOM_ADR# , #HOM_CNT# , #SBI_CDE# , #MET_DIP# , #MOF_CDE# , #PRD_NUM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #MET_NUM# , #MET_MOF# , #HOM_HJD# )

/* 급수전계량기 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM# , HOM_NAM = #HOM_NAM# , HOM_CDE = #HOM_CDE# , HOM_ADR = #HOM_ADR# , HOM_CNT = #HOM_CNT# , SBI_CDE = #SBI_CDE# , MET_DIP = #MET_DIP# , MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE# , PRD_NUM = #PRD_NUM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , MET_NUM = #MET_NUM# , MET_MOF = #MET_MOF# , HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , HOM_NUM = #HOM_NUM# , HOM_NAM = #HOM_NAM# , HOM_CDE = #HOM_CDE# , HOM_ADR = #HOM_ADR# , HOM_CNT = #HOM_CNT# , SBI_CDE = #SBI_CDE# , MET_DIP = #MET_DIP# , MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE# , PRD_NUM = #PRD_NUM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , MET_NUM = #MET_NUM# , MET_MOF = #MET_MOF# , HOM_HJD = #HOM_HJD#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , IST_YMD , HOM_NUM , HOM_NAM , HOM_CDE , HOM_ADR , HOM_CNT , SBI_CDE , MET_DIP , MOF_CDE , PRD_NUM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , MET_NUM , MET_MOF , HOM_HJD ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #IST_YMD# , #HOM_NUM# , #HOM_NAM# , #HOM_CDE# , #HOM_ADR# , #HOM_CNT# , #SBI_CDE# , #MET_DIP# , #MOF_CDE# , #PRD_NUM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #MET_NUM# , #MET_MOF# , #HOM_HJD# )
/* 급수전계량기 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_META_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
